lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator

Class LockSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator.AbstractHardware<LockSimulatorListener>
      • lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator.LockSimulator

  • public class LockSimulator
extends AbstractHardware<LockSimulatorListener>
    A simple lock device to prevent or to permit the interior of the vending machine to be accessed. The lock does not directly act on the hardware otherwise. By default the lock is initially locked. It ignores the enabled/disabled state.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isLocked

        public boolean isLocked()
        Returns whether the lock is currently locked. Causes no events.

      • loadWithoutEvents

        public void loadWithoutEvents(boolean locked)
        Permits the lock to be initially locked or unlocked without causing events.

      • lock

        public void lock()
        Causes the lock to become locked. Announces a "locked" event to its listeners.

      • unlock

        public void unlock()
        Causes the lock to become unlocked. Announces an "unlocked" event to its listeners.
